item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Foundation upgrade to 3.22
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 5, 00:00 - 06:00 UTC

Aug 30, 09:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/09/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 05/09/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that the following informations :
o As for each Foundation upgrade, we'll recreate the whole region, meaning at some point we'll have almost twice the number of instances (the old in 3.21, the new ones in 3.22).
o All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, it's also possible to notice increased deployment times.
o Projects provisioning should not be impacted.

item.title: [RBX/GRA/SBG][Hosted Exchange] - ex3.mail.ovh.net
item.description:
Sep 1, 08:41 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 01/09/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 01/09/2022 08:35 UTC
Service impact : ex3.mail.ovh.net is reachable and all services are back to normal.
Root cause : Network issue

Sep 1, 08:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/09/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : ex3.mail.ovh.net is currently unreachable.
Reception and transmission of mail are unavailable. Mails waiting to be received are currently queued
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident

item.title: [P19][MX Plan] - homez.511
item.description:
Aug 25, 18:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/08/2022 12:20 UTC
End Time : 25/08/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : The backup is completed, all services are operationals again.
Root cause : The incident was related to a data storage access.

Aug 25, 16:39 UTC
Update - The backup is in progress, the restoration is 84% complete.

Aug 24, 18:18 UTC
Update - The back up has had a malfunction. We need to reload it.
This operation should continue for about 24 hours.

Aug 24, 09:31 UTC
Update - Some mail sent between 12:15 UTC and 22:00 UTC might be bounced to the sender.
The backup is still in progress.

Aug 24, 07:39 UTC
Update - The backup is still in progress, the restoration is 84% complete.

Aug 23, 18:13 UTC
Update - Our teams will restore a backup made on 23/08/22 at 01:15 UTC.
Emails in transit since 23/08/22 at 12:15 UTC will be delivered when mailbox are operational

Aug 23, 15:49 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams determined that the incident was related to a data storage access.
Our teams are working to restore the situation as soon as possible

Aug 23, 14:12 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2022 12:20 UTC
Service impact : Reception, transmission, mailbox access and redirection may be unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident

item.title: [67-68][InternetAccess] - xDSL/FTTH absence of connection
item.description:
Aug 22, 06:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/08/2022 06:00 UTC
End Time : 22/08/2022 05:59 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Current status : Resolved

Aug 19, 14:13 UTC
Update - New optical cables have been installed. fusion soldering is underway to restore your services

Aug 19, 11:48 UTC
Update - We escalated the intervention's importance.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Aug 19, 09:35 UTC
Identified - Root Cause : Fiber Cut
Two point of failure has been identified around Strasbourg.
The intervention is working on fixing those issues.

Aug 19, 08:14 UTC
Update - A intervention has started to fix the issue.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Aug 19, 07:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/08/2022 06:00 UTC

Our technical teams are investigating the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA1/GRA3][Web Hosting] - Sharedsql databases migration
item.description:
Aug 18, 00:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 10, 12:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 9, 14:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/08/2022 12:00 UTC
End time : 18/08/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During this operation, our customers may experience an unavailability of 1 minute
Service improvement: Within the framework of the continuous improvement of our services, we carry out an operation of migration of the databases from GRA1 to GRA3. The concerned cluster by this maintenance is: sql008 (GRA1). Containers will migrate to eu011 (GRA3)
Please note that the current maintenance can take place 24/24.
